depositActionText: How much ETH would you like to withdraw?
createInstruct: Please set a value of ETH for collateral, to determine how much DAI you would like to generate.
paybackNotice: You might be requested to sign up to three trasactions if there is not enough allowance in DAI and/or MKR to complete this transaction.
paybackQuestion: How much DAI would you like to payback?
liquidationRisk: Your new collateral ratio of {value}% may place CDP at risk of liquidation.
understandAndAgree: I understand and agree with it.
generateQuestion: How much DAI would you like to generate?
pethPopover: Pooled ETH, which means it joins a large pool of Ethereum that is the collateral for all Dai created.
moveNotice: You may only move your CDP to an Ethereum address that you own. By clicking the box below, you(“You”)affirmatively represent that you alone own and control (i) the CDP that you will transfer, and (ii) the public Ethereum address to which it will be transferred.
moveQuestion: Enter the address to send the cdp?
withdrawNotice: You might be requested to sign up to three transactions if there is not enough allowance in DAI and/or MKR to complete this transaction.
withdrawQuestion: How much ETH would you like to withdraw?
depositQuestion: How much ETH would you like to deposit?
closingNotice: Closing your CDP requires paying back your outstanding DAI debt, as well as the accumulated stability fee. The stability fee can be paid in either DAI or MKR.
notEnoughDaiClose: Not enough DAI to close this CDP
notEnoughMkrClose: Not enough MKR to close this CDP
proxyInstructions: in order to interact with your cdp you first need to create a proxy to perform the many individual actions required for each cdp interaction.
migrateInstructions: in order to interact with your cdp you need to associate it with the created proxy which will perform the many individual actions required for each cdp interaction.
moveWithProxy: This CDP will be moved to the MakerCDP proxy registered with the destination address.
moveWithoutProxy: When accessing the CDP from the destination address for the first time a MakerCDP proxy will need to be registered first before any interaction with the CDP can occur.
